works.description:
I have searched for the following  
excerpt "I will be using CrystalDiskMark, a very popular disk benchmark  
software to do the test on a clean Windows XP computer with service pack 3
 
and all latest hotfixes" which I have written in my own words to find the 

following infringing URLs.

This is original work by me and I hold the copyright of the content. After
 
investigating the infringing URLs, the reported URLs have copied my whole 

post along with images (some even hotlinked).

Kindly take appropriate action.
